extension.searchTitle: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on medical devices.;Protect Medical Innovation Act of 2015;H.R. 160 (IH)

titleInfo.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on medical devices.

extension.officialTitle: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on medical devices.
